Quotes.text: Your eyes can deceive you; don’t trust them.
Quotes.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope

Quotes.text: Luminous beings are we, not this crude matter.
Quotes.author: Yoda
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back

Quotes.text: In my experience, there’s no such thing as luck.
Quotes.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope

Quotes.text: Try not. Do—or do not. There is no try.
Quotes.author: Yoda
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back

Quotes.text: Never tell me the odds.
Quotes.author: Han Solo
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back

Quotes.text: Once you start down the dark path, forever will it dominate your destiny.
Quotes.author: Yoda
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back

Quotes.text: There’s always a bigger fish.
Quotes.author: Qui-Gon Jinn
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace

Quotes.text: Fear leads to anger, anger leads to hate, hate leads to suffering.
Quotes.author: Yoda
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace

Quotes.text: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
Quotes.author: Darth Vader
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope

Quotes.text: Let go of your hate.
Quotes.author: Luke Skywalker
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi

Quotes.text: Your focus determines your reality.
Quotes.author: Qui-Gon Jinn
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace

Quotes.text: Who’s the more foolish; the fool, or the fool who follows him?
Quotes.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope

Quotes.text: I was not elected to watch my people suffer and die while you discuss this invasion in a committee.
Quotes.author: Queen Amidala
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace

Quotes.text: Compassion, which I would define as unconditional love, is essential to a Jedi’s life. So you might say that we are encouraged to love.
Quotes.author: Anakin Skywalker
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones

Quotes.text: So this is how liberty dies…with thunderous applause.
Quotes.author: Queen Amidala
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith

Quotes.text: Great, kid. Don’t get cocky.
Quotes.author: Han Solo
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope

Quotes.text: In a dark place we find ourselves, and a little more knowledge lights our way.
Quotes.author: Yoda
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith

Quotes.text: Keep your concentration here and now, where it belongs.
Quotes.author: Qui-Gon Jinn
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace

Quotes.text: The fear of loss is a path to the dark side.
Quotes.author: Yoda
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith

Quotes.text: I have a bad feeling about this.
Quotes.author: Princess Leia
Quotes.source: Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back
